text: I would rate this product four stars for its strength and delightful flavors. The robustness of the coffee is impressive, providing a bold and invigorating experience with each sip. The variety of flavors available adds a pleasant twist to the overall taste profile, making it an enjoyable and versatile choice. However, I deducted one star due to the absence of a noticeable coffee fragrance. While the taste is exceptional, the lack of a strong coffee aroma may be disappointing for those who appreciate the full sensory experience of their coffee. Nonetheless, the strength and flavors of this product make it a worthy choice for coffee enthusiasts seeking a bold and flavorful cup.
title: Loving it!

text: I recently tasted this brand's coffee, and I was pleasantly surprised by its rich and balanced flavor. The smell was lovely
title: The smell was lovely.

text: Great coffee, could be a bit stronger/concentrated, would like more customization options. For example: allow putting in double the packets of a flavor and less of something you don't like
title: Great coffee, could be a bit more stronger/concentrated, would like more customization options

text: If I had to rank the flavours in decreasing order of deliciousness, it would be: Butterscotch, French Vanilla, Hazelnut, and Columbian Brew. Not that I didn't like Columbian Brew, but the other flavours are far better.It's strong, it's delicious, and it's affordable. Go for the smaller pack though, so you can decide which flavour you want next time.
title: Good coffee at a budget
